title: Share of U.S. travelers who have had items stolen or lost 2015
summary: This is a bar chart representing Response in the x axis and Share of respondents in the y axis.
The Share of respondents is appeared to be the highest at Response Smartphone and lowest at Response Passport.
The highest value at Response Smartphone is 2.5x times more than the lowest value at Passport.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Response in the x axis and Share of respondents in the y axis.
The maximum Share of respondents 10.0 is found at Response Smartphone and the minimum is found at Passport where Response is 4.0.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Response in the x axis and Share of respondents in the y axis.
The Share of respondents is appeared to be the highest at Response Smartphone and lowest at Response Passport.
The highest value at Response Smartphone is 2.5x times more than the lowest value at Passport.
max_summary: This bar chart has 5 columns on the x axis representing Response, and Share of respondents in each Response on the y axis.
Response Smartphone has the highest Share of respondents and Passport has the lowest Share of respondents.
Response Passport has 2.5 times less Share of respondents than Response Smartphone which is the highest.
The Response Smartphone has the highest Share of respondents, followed by Credit card, and Debit card. Down to the Response Passport which is the lowest.
The Response Passport has 1.35 times less Share of respondents than average.
The Share of respondents is 37.0 if we add up values of all Responses.
